name: Cragspire Mountains
description: Towering peaks pierce the clouds, their snow-capped summits gleaming in the sunlight. Rocky paths wind precariously along cliff faces, while the thin air makes every breath a struggle.

common.name: mountain_herbs
common.description: Hardy alpine plants with medicinal properties.

common.name: loose_stones
common.description: Rocks suitable for simple tools or ammunition.

uncommon.name: iron_ore
uncommon.description: Raw iron deposits exposed by weathering.

uncommon.name: crystal_formations

rare.description: A rare deposit of the legendary light metal.

random_events.name: Mountain Shrine
random_events.description: High on a peak, you discover an ancient shrine dedicated to the mountain spirits. Prayer flags flutter in the wind.

pray_at_shrine.description: The mountain spirits bless your journey with enhanced endurance.

leave_offering.description: Your respectful gesture honors the ancient traditions.

random_events.name: Rockslide
random_events.description: The path ahead is blocked by a recent rockslide. You hear voices calling for help from beneath the rubble.

dig_for_survivors.description: You rescue trapped miners who reward your heroism.
